Shares in Bank of Ayudhya shed 7.5 percent  their biggest one-day loss in a year  pulling the Thai benchmark index  down 1 percent at 1 274.50  the lowest close since Sept. 18.     General Electric sold a 7.6 percent stake in Bank of Ayudhya

column4: General Electric trims stake in Thailand's Bank of Ayudhya
column5: HONG KONG General Electric Co (GE)  sold about a quarter of its stake in Bank of Ayudhya  under a global plan to shed non-core assets  after the value of its five-year investment in Thailand's most profitable bank more than doubled.
